org.lafayette.server.web.nonce

Interface Nonce

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BaseNonce, Sha1

    public interface Nonce
    Implementors of this interface generated random cryptographic strength NONCE strings.
    Author:
    Sven Strittmatter

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  Nonce.DigestAlgorithm
      Supported digest algorithms.
      static class  Nonce.RandonAlgorithm
      SUpported algorithms.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String calculateNonce()
      Calculates a random nonce.
      String getNext()
      Return the next nonce.
      boolean isValid(String nonce)
      Verify if a NONCE is valid.

    • Method Detail

      • getNext

        String getNext()
        Return the next nonce. This method guarantees that a nonce is never returned twice.
        Returns:
        Nonce string.

      • calculateNonce

        String calculateNonce()
        Calculates a random nonce. This method may return an already calculated nonce twice.
        Returns:
        Nonce string.

      • isValid

        boolean isValid(String nonce)
        Verify if a NONCE is valid. A NONCE is valid if it was issued by this generator and not invalidated yet.
        Parameters:
        nonce - NONCE to verify
        Returns:
        true if valid, else false
